alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Perkins; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued December 04 at 1:02AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .DISCUSSION...Expect partly cloudy skies today with windy conditions. High temperatures will be in the upper 40s to low 50s. Winds will be northwest at 20 to 40 mph with gusts to 65 mph possible, mainly over northwest SD. Minimum relative humidity will fall to 25 to 35 percent, lowest east of the Black Hills. This will support extreme fire danger over far western SD. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Tuesday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the moderate category.
